revised_title: John Couch Adams: A Life of Humility and Scientific Pursuit
tldr: This article discusses the life and work of John Couch Adams, a 19th-century astronomer who made significant contributions to the field. Despite not being the first to discover Neptune, Adams' work in celestial mechanics and his dedication to his scientific pursuits are highlighted. The author also touches upon Adams' personal life, including his religious beliefs and humble nature.
